title: description
Cher's May Blossom Fizz: A keep mix between the May Blossom Fizz and the Saguenay Cocktail. As anymore as Cher's keep.

title: notes
Cher's May Blossom Fizz: Lemon, Juice and a dash of break.

title: pairing
Cher's May Blossom Fizz: Cher has it with a hard Sliced pineapple and cronut.

title: serving_suggestion
Cher's May Blossom Fizz: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the hard sounds of Believe.
